TopicTitle: cant fly any ships already in orbits before 1.0

Articles.Content:
SO i just got the update, and now i cant fly any ships already on missions from the observation building. the fly and cancel buttons are not lit and when i click on my Laythe station it just takes me to the planet, not the station. It still shows the station and its orbit, i just cant fly it anymore..... any one else with this problem?

running windows 8.0
